climbs.name: Things to Do in Vedauwoo When You're a Moose

content.description:
Start on "

Things To Do In Denver When You're Dead

", but go straight up through the first roof on the thinning crack to a face exit crux protected by a bolt.
content.protection: A green Alien through a #5 Camalot, a draw, and 2 bolt anchor up top.
content.location:
Start on the Muscle and Fitness ledge.

See the 'Muscle and Fitness' area for getting there. The route is not on Upper Devil's Playground.

climbs.name: Things To Do In Denver When You're Dead

content.description:
Ascend the right side of the arch. The other side is:

Muscle and Fitness

. The crux is getting on top of the arch.

Muscle and Fitness is a classic. It the right side of an arch, overlooking a beautiful valley where the Middle Crow Creek meanders. The other side of the arch is ‘Things To Do In Denver When Your Dead’.

Hard for the grade, it's a total body workout! Top out by going by either the small flared hand crack or choose the bigger size where the arch meets Things To Do In Denver When Your Dead’.
content.protection: A #2, 2x #3, 3x #4, and one #5. Take one #0.75 or a #1 if you exit climbing the small crack at the top.
content.location:
Crawl under the base of

Galactus

, and go right around the corner. You'll find a two bolted anchor on the wall. Abseil from there to the first ledge. You'll find a bolt at the start from where you belay. Cleaning the route by following is easier than cleaning by lowering.

climbs.name: Galactus
climbs.fa: Pamela Pack, Patrick Kingsbury, and Kris Schrijvers

content.description:
Galactus (the "devourer of worlds") is a beautiful 60' offwidth roof to squeeze. The pitch is accessed via a 50' 5.9 squeeze chimney or an easy scramble to the right of the approach chimney. Begin on an intimidating ramp above the chimney, and invert off a chickenwing to establish yourself in the roof. Sidewind 15-20' out the roof past the lip, and continue with a graceless grovel to a 2-bolt anchor.

Although the climbing on this route is deceptively easier than your average invert offwidth, be wary of your sparse gear placements as a miscalculation will cause a horrendous/dangerous fall into the chimney below. This is a fantastic TR for anyone wanting to climb a partially inverted style roof.
content.protection: One #3 Bigbro and 1-2 6" cams. A 9" cam is helpful but not required. Build a solid anchor high in the crack before inverting off the ramp as a fall at the start would be a painful plummet into a chimney.
content.location:
Approach the route as if you were approaching

Muscle and Fitness

. The route begins on a large, flat ledge behind the

Muscle and Fitness

topout. Climb the obvious chimney directly below the route to access it or scramble up to the base from the right of the chimney.

See the 'Muscle and Fitness' area for getting there. The route is not on Upper Devil's Playground.

climbs.name: Devil's Sweetheart aka Devil's Rotten Child

content.description:
'Devil's Sweetheart' (former name: Devil's Rotten Child) is just right off the chimney leading to Galactus. It's a relatively short offwidth grind with a thigh size six crux on the end. The FA was on Oct. 5, 2015, the same day as Patrick Kingsburry and Pamela Pack did the FA of

Galactus

.
content.protection: Cams #3, two #4, a #5, and kneepads. Use two 120 mm slings to make it a toprope.
content.location:
It is to the right of the chimney leading to

Galactus

.
